workflow.name: Repurpose blog & YouTube content to social media with GPT-5.1 and Google Docs
workflow.description:
Transform blog posts, YouTube videos, or any text into LinkedIn posts, Twitter threads, email newsletters, and more with GPT-5.1


### Who is this for?

- **Content creators** who want to maximize reach from every piece of content
- **Marketing teams** repurposing long-form content for social media
- **Founders & executives** sharing thought leadership across platforms
- **Agencies** creating multi-platform content packages for clients
- **Solopreneurs** who need to be everywhere but have limited time

### What problem does it solve?

Creating platform-specific content is time-consuming. A single blog post could become LinkedIn posts, Twitter threads, email newsletters, and video scripts-but manually adapting content for each platform takes hours.

This workflow automates the entire process. Drop in a URL or paste your content, and get 7+ ready-to-use content pieces in under 2 minutes.

### What this workflow does

**Step 1: Content Input**
- Submit via simple web form
- Accepts blog URLs, YouTube URLs, or raw text
- Optional: specify target audience and custom instructions

**Step 2: Smart Extraction**
- **Blog posts:** Fetches and extracts article content, removes navigation/ads
- **YouTube videos:** Gets video metadata and description via YouTube API
- **Raw text:** Processes directly with automatic title detection

**Step 3: AI Content Generation**
GPT-4.1/5.1 analyzes your content and generates platform-optimized variations:

| Output | What You Get |
|--------|-------------|
| **LinkedIn Posts** | 3 variations (story-driven, list format, contrarian angle) |
| **Twitter/X Thread** | 7-tweet thread + alternative hook for A/B testing |
| **Email Newsletter** | 3 subject lines + preview text + full body |
| **Key Takeaways** | 5 actionable bullet points |
| **Quote Cards** | 5 shareable quotes ready for graphics |
| **Video Script** | 60-second script (hook ‚Üí problem ‚Üí solution ‚Üí CTA) |

**Step 4: Google Docs Output**
- Everything saved to a beautifully formatted Google Doc
- Organized by platform
- Copy, customize, and publish!

### Outputs Generated

**LinkedIn Posts (3 variations):**
- Story-driven emotional hook
- List/tips format for engagement
- Contrarian/hot take angle
- Each includes: hook, body, CTA, hashtags

**Twitter/X Thread (7 tweets):**
- Scroll-stopping hook
- Logical flow through your key points
- Clear CTA at the end
- Alternative hook for A/B testing

**Email Newsletter:**
- 3 subject line options (curiosity, benefit, direct)
- Preview text
- Conversational body copy
- Clear CTA

**Key Takeaways:**
- 5 actionable insights
- Perfect for bullet points, carousels, or summaries

**Quote Cards:**
- 5 impactful, shareable quotes
- Context included for each
- Ready for Canva/social graphics

**Video Script:**
- 60-second format
- Hook ‚Üí Problem ‚Üí Solution ‚Üí Proof ‚Üí CTA structure
- Visual suggestions included

### Setup Instructions

#### Required Credentials

**1. OpenAI API**
- Get your API key from [platform.openai.com](https://platform.openai.com)
- Add as "OpenAI API" credential in n8n
- Used for: Content generation (GPT-4o)

**2. Google Docs**
- Create OAuth2 credentials in Google Cloud Console
- Enable Google Docs API
- Add as "Google Docs OAuth2" credential in n8n
- Used for: Saving generated content

#### Optional Credentials

**3. YouTube OAuth2 (use same clientId and secret as above)**

- Enable YouTube Data API v3
- Add a new "YouTube OAuth2 API" credential:
  - Client ID and Secret, same as above
- Used for: Better video metadata extraction

### How to Use

1. **Import the workflow** into your n8n instance
2. **Configure credentials** (OpenAI required, Google Docs required, YouTube optional)
3. **Activate the workflow**
4. **Open the form URL** (shown in Form Trigger node)
5. **Submit your content:**
   - Select content type (Blog URL, YouTube URL, or Raw Text)
   - Paste URL or content
   - (Optional) Add target audience
   - (Optional) Add custom instructions
6. **Get your Google Doc link** with all generated content!

### Customization Options

**Modify the AI prompt:**
- Edit "AI Content Generator" node
- Adjust tone guidelines
- Add industry-specific instructions
- Change output formats

**Change output destination:**
- Replace Google Docs with Notion, Airtable, or other platforms
- Add Slack notification with summary
- Email the doc link

**Add more platforms:**
- Instagram captions
- Pinterest descriptions
- Podcast show notes

### Example Use Case

**Input:**
- Blog post URL: `https://example.com/10-tips-for-startup-founders`
- Target audience: "First-time startup founders"
- Instructions: "Focus on practical, actionable advice"

**Output (in ~90 seconds):**
- 3 LinkedIn posts with founder-focused hooks
- 7-tweet thread breaking down the top tips
- Email newsletter to subscribers
- 5 quotable insights for graphics
- 60-second video script for TikTok/Reels

### Estimated Costs

| Service | Cost |
|---------|------|
| OpenAI (GPT-5.1) | ~$0.01-0.03 per generation |
| YouTube API | Free (10,000 queries/day) |
| Google Docs API | Free |

**Total per use:** ~$0.02-0.04

### Tips for Best Results

1. **Longer content = better output** - Articles with 1000+ words generate richer variations
2. **YouTube videos need captions** - Videos without captions may have limited output
3. **Specify your audience** - Adding target audience improves relevance significantly
4. **Use custom instructions** - Guide the AI toward your preferred tone and focus

### Support

Questions or need customization? Contact [Agentical AI](https://agenticalai.com)

---

parameters.content:
## üé® AI Content Repurposing Engine

Transform any content into multiple formats for social media, email, and more.

---

### What It Does
1. **Input:** Blog URL, YouTube URL, or raw text
2. **Extract:** Scrapes article or fetches video transcript
3. **Generate:** AI creates 7 content variations
4. **Output:** Formatted Google Doc with everything

---

### Content Generated
- 3x LinkedIn posts (hook + body + CTA)
- Twitter/X thread (7 tweets)
- Email newsletter (3 subject lines + body)
- 5 Key takeaways
- 5 Quote cards for graphics
- 60-second video script

---

### Required Credentials
- **OpenAI** - GPT-4o for content generation
- **Google Docs** - Output destination

### Optional Credentials
- **YouTube API** - Better video metadata

---

### Setup
1. Add OpenAI credential
2. Add Google Docs credential
3. (Optional) Add YouTube API key
4. Activate workflow
5. Fill out form & get your content!

---

### Tips
- Longer content = better output
- Blog posts typically work best
- YouTube videos need captions enabled
- Add target audience for better results

---

**Created by [Agentical AI](https://agenticalai.com)**

üí° Need custom automation? Visit us!

### 1Ô∏è‚É£ Content Input

Form accepts 3 input types:

**Blog URL** ‚Üí Fetched & scraped
**YouTube URL** ‚Üí Transcript extracted
**Raw Text** ‚Üí Direct input

Optional fields:
- Target audience
- Custom instructions

### 2Ô∏è‚É£ Content Extraction

**Blog Path:**
Fetch HTML ‚Üí Extract article content ‚Üí Clean text

**YouTube Path:**
Extract video ID ‚Üí Get metadata via API ‚Üí Fetch transcript ‚Üí Combine

**Raw Text:**
Pass through with metadata

All paths merge into unified format for AI.

### 3Ô∏è‚É£ AI Content Generation

GPT analyzes content and generates:

‚úÖ **LinkedIn** - 3 variations with hooks
‚úÖ **Twitter** - 7-tweet thread
‚úÖ **Email** - Subject lines + newsletter
‚úÖ **Takeaways** - 5 key points
‚úÖ **Quotes** - 5 shareable snippets
‚úÖ **Video Script** - 60-sec format

AI adapts tone to match source content.

### 4Ô∏è‚É£ Google Docs Output

Creates formatted document:
- Source info & summary
- All generated content
- Organized by platform
- Ready to copy/paste

New doc available in drive.

parameters.formDescription:
Transform your blog posts, YouTube videos, or any text into LinkedIn posts, Twitter threads, email newsletters, and more!

Powered by GPT-4o ‚Ä¢ Output saved to Google Docs

values.content:
=You are an expert content strategist, copywriter, and social media specialist. Your task is to repurpose content into multiple platform-optimized formats.

## Your Approach
1. First, deeply analyze the source content to understand:
   - Core message and key insights
   - Tone and voice (professional, casual, technical, etc.)
   - Target audience (if specified, otherwise infer)
   - Unique angles and quotable moments

2. Then create content that:
   - Maintains the original value and insights
   - Adapts to each platform's best practices
   - Uses hooks and engagement techniques
   - Provides clear calls-to-action

## Output Requirements
You MUST respond with valid JSON in this exact structure:

```json
{
  "analysis": {
    "contentSummary": "<2-3 sentence summary of the core message>",
    "detectedTone": "<Professional|Casual|Educational|Inspirational|Technical|Conversational|Authoritative>",
    "mainTopics": ["<topic1>", "<topic2>", "<topic3>"],
    "targetAudience": "<identified or inferred target audience>",
    "keyMessage": "<the single most important takeaway>"
  },
  
  "linkedInPosts": [
    {
      "style": "Story-driven",
      "hook": "<attention-grabbing first line - make them stop scrolling>",
      "body": "<main content with strategic line breaks for readability, 150-200 words>",
      "cta": "<call to action - question or engagement prompt>",
      "hashtags": ["#relevant", "#hashtags", "#max5"]
    },
    {
      "style": "List/Tips format",
      "hook": "<hook>",
      "body": "<body>",
      "cta": "<cta>",
      "hashtags": []
    },
    {
      "style": "Contrarian/Hot take",
      "hook": "<hook>",
      "body": "<body>",
      "cta": "<cta>",
      "hashtags": []
    }
  ],
  
  "twitterThread": {
    "tweets": [
      "<Tweet 1: Hook - must grab attention, max 280 chars>",
      "<Tweet 2: Context/Problem>",
      "<Tweet 3: Key insight 1>",
      "<Tweet 4: Key insight 2>",
      "<Tweet 5: Key insight 3>",
      "<Tweet 6: Summary/So what?>",
      "<Tweet 7: CTA + link placeholder>"
    ],
    "altHook": "<alternative opening tweet for A/B testing>"
  },
  
  "emailNewsletter": {
    "subjectLines": [
      "<option 1 - curiosity-driven>",
      "<option 2 - benefit-focused>",
      "<option 3 - direct/clear>"
    ],
    "previewText": "<50-100 char preview that complements subject>",
    "greeting": "<personalized opening>",
    "body": "<newsletter body: intro ‚Üí main points ‚Üí conclusion, conversational tone>",
    "cta": "<clear call-to-action>",
    "signOff": "<professional sign-off>"
  },
  
  "keyTakeaways": [
    "<actionable takeaway 1>",
    "<actionable takeaway 2>",
    "<actionable takeaway 3>",
    "<actionable takeaway 4>",
    "<actionable takeaway 5>"
  ],
  
  "quoteCards": [
    {
      "quote": "<impactful, shareable quote - 10-20 words>",
      "context": "<brief context for the quote>"
    },
    { "quote": "<quote 2>", "context": "<context>" },
    { "quote": "<quote 3>", "context": "<context>" },
    { "quote": "<quote 4>", "context": "<context>" },
    { "quote": "<quote 5>", "context": "<context>" }
  ],
  
  "shortFormVideoScript": {
    "format": "Hook ‚Üí Problem ‚Üí Solution ‚Üí Proof ‚Üí CTA",
    "targetLength": "60 seconds",
    "sections": {
      "hook": "<0-3 sec: pattern interrupt, make them stop scrolling>",
      "problem": "<3-12 sec: identify pain point they relate to>",
      "solution": "<12-35 sec: present the insight/solution>",
      "proof": "<35-50 sec: evidence, example, or story>",
      "cta": "<50-60 sec: what should they do next?>"
    },
    "visualNotes": "<suggestions for b-roll, text overlays, or transitions>"
  }
}
```

## Platform Guidelines

**LinkedIn:**
- First line is EVERYTHING - make it scroll-stopping
- Use line breaks for readability (no walls of text)
- Personal stories and lessons outperform generic advice
- End with engagement question or clear CTA
- 5 hashtags max, mix of broad and niche

**Twitter/X:**
- Each tweet must work standalone AND as part of thread
- Tweet 1 determines if anyone reads the rest
- Use numbers, contrarian takes, or curiosity gaps
- Keep most tweets under 200 chars for retweets
- End with clear CTA

**Email:**
- Subject line is 80% of the battle
- Preview text should complement, not repeat subject
- Write like you're emailing a smart friend
- One clear CTA per email

**Quote Cards:**
- Must work WITHOUT context
- Emotional or thought-provoking
- Easy to read at a glance
- No jargon

**Video Script:**
- Hook in first 3 seconds or they scroll
- Speak directly to viewer ("you")
- One idea per video
- Clear, actionable ending

user.bio:
üöÄ Automate. Scale. Win.

Are you still manually following up with leads or relying on staff to answer every call?

I help agencies and business owners deploy AI voice agents and chatbots that book appointments 24/7, qualify leads instantly, and eliminate 90% of repetitive tasks‚Äîwithout writing a single line of code.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
